entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 7:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to freezing rain or rain this evening and then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain before morning. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Snowfall amount 5 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
